attributes.action: Ensure that dogs tails are not docked
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Ignore the petition to allow the docking of dogs tails, and to go further and instruct the appropriate authorities to change the "specification" used at Crufts and other dog shows so that any animal with a docked tail is automatically disqualified.
Also to ban from keeping animals for life anyone found docking tails themselves eg Banding etc

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
